trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Mesquite
There were no other sightings in Mesquite on or around February 20th 2006
Summary: off of highway to the east .several cars and myself pulled over to see.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was drivin back from Las Vegas to Mesquite NV. Off to east was a disc shaped craft with lights moving in a circle around it. It had wavy like marage heat coming down to the ground. severa other cars stopped to observe. It hovered for several min.and shot up in the air and dissapared.
